name: Bilaspur
description: Bilaspur is a district in Himachal Pradesh known for its artificial lake, historic temples, and cultural heritage. The district is famous for its traditional festivals and the Gobind Sagar Lake.
summary: A perfect blend of natural beauty and cultural heritage

locations.name: Gobind Sagar Lake
locations.description: Artificial lake created by the Bhakra Dam, offering water sports and scenic views.
locations.address: Gobind Sagar Lake, Bilaspur District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Naina Devi Temple
locations.description: Ancient temple dedicated to Goddess Naina Devi, offering panoramic views of the surrounding hills.
locations.address: Naina Devi, Bilaspur District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Bhakra Dam
locations.description: One of the highest gravity dams in the world, offering guided tours and scenic views.
locations.address: Bhakra Dam, Bilaspur District, Himachal Pradesh

locations.name: Kandrour Bridge
locations.description: Historic bridge offering scenic views of the Sutlej River and surrounding hills.

locations.name: Sri Naina Devi Wildlife Sanctuary
locations.description: Protected area known for its diverse flora and fauna, offering trekking opportunities.
locations.address: Naina Devi, Bilaspur District, Himachal Pradesh
